1.0.0.name: wordpress/woocommerce-payu-paisa
1.0.0.description:
WooCommerce - The most user friendly e-commerce toolkit that helps you sell anything. Beautifully. PayU Paisa - Redefining Payments, Simplifying Lives! Empowering any business to collect money online within minutes

The two together is an awsome combination for any INDIAN merchant looking for an eCommerece pressence, without any finiacial load. * "WooCommerce" is an open source application * "PayU Paisa" is offering payment collection with no setup cost.

Visit http://www.kdcLabs.com for more info about this plugin.
